==Abilities==
''Most attack names are unofficial.''
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy = Emperor of Fire and Iron

|name_1      = Ambush
|desc_1      = Upon being [[Aggravation|aggroed]], strikes the ground in front with its claw, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.

|name_2      = Twin Molten Horns
|desc_2      = The Emperor of Fire and Iron has a pair of horns on top of it that grants it a '''60%''' [[RES]] increase to all DMG and enables it to use stronger attacks. The horns are {{Pyro}}-infused and can be destroyed using [[Elemental Reaction]]s. When the horns are destroyed, the Emperor of Fire and Iron will become paralyzed for a period of time.
* If Research Topic: Environment Enhancement Experiment is enabled, the horns' durability and RES increased are doubled.
{{Elemental Shield Data
|title   = Molten Horns
|element = Pyro
|gu      = 48

|title2   = Molten Horns (Enhanced)
|element2 = Pyro
|gu2      = 96
}}

|name_3      = Left Claw Strike
|desc_3      = Slams its left claw into the ground, dealing '''60% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
|file_3_2    = Emperor of Fire and Iron Left Claw Strike 2
|caption_3_2 = Enhanced

|name_4      = Right Claw Strike
|desc_4      = Swings at the target with its right claw, dealing '''50% ATK''' or '''60% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
|file_4_2    = Emperor of Fire and Iron Right Claw Strike 2
|caption_4_2 = Enhanced

|name_5      = Charging Strike
|desc_5      = Rushes towards the player and swings one of its claws, dealing '''70% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}. This attack is only used while the Molten Horns are intact.

|name_6      = Leaping Crush
|desc_6      = Locks onto the player, leaps into the air, and slams down at the player's location, dealing '''80% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}. After this attack, its horns become exposed to melee attacks for a period of time. This attack is only used while the Molten Horns are intact.
* If Research Topic: Molten Throne is enabled, the struck area will become a Molten Throne. The Molten Throne deals '''7% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} every '''0.5''' seconds to players, and heals the Tyrant of Fire and Iron by '''1% Max HP''' every '''2''' seconds if it is within the area.
|file_6      = Emperor of Fire and Iron Leaping Crush 2
|file_6_2    = Emperor of Fire and Iron Leaping Crush 3
|caption_6_2 = Research Topic: Molten Throne

|name_7      = Volcanic Eruption
|desc_7      = Shoots countless fireballs out of its horns, each dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} upon landing and leaving the struck ground burnt. Burnt ground deals '''6% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} every 0.5s to players standing on it. This attack can be used up to 3 times in a row and is only used while the Molten Horns are intact.

|name_8      = Molten Trail
|desc_8      = Thrusts a fireball into the ground with its claw, dealing '''30% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} and causes a trail of explosions, dealing '''70% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} and leaving the ground burnt. Burnt ground deals '''6% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} every 0.5s to players standing on it. This attack is only used while the Molten Horns are intact.

|name_9      = Searing Coronation
|desc_9      = Moves to the center of the arena and half-buries itself to charge a massive explosion, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} and leaving ground near the center of the arena burnt. Burnt ground deals '''6% ATK''' as {{Color|Pyro DMG}} every 0.5s to players standing on it. While charging the explosion, its horns are exposed to melee attacks. This attack is only used while the Molten Horns are intact.
* If Research Topic: Blazing Coronation is enabled, spawns 2 lava crystals while charging. The lava crystals are {{Pyro}} objects and are weakest against {{Hydro}}. If charging completes, downs all active characters, and restores '''12 GU''' to the Molten Horns for each intact lava crystal. If both lava crystals are destroyed, this attack will be interrupted, and the Molten Horns will lose '''24 GU'''.
|file_9_2    = Emperor of Fire and Iron Searing Coronation 2
|caption_9_2 = Research Topic: Blazing Coronation

|name_10     = Partial Regeneration
|desc_10     = After the Molten Horns' durability drops below '''33%''', inserts its claws into the ground to absorb elemental energy from the environment, restoring '''6 GU''' to the Molten Horns every '''3''' seconds for a total of '''5''' times.<br><br>While absorbing, also gains an extremely strong '''20 GU''' {{Pyro}} aura that decays over '''15''' seconds.<br><br>After absorption completes, enters an enhanced state for '''30''' seconds, during which:
* ATK is increased by '''80%'''
* The Tyrant of Fire and Iron can only use '''Left Claw Strike''' and '''Right Claw Strike''', but their DMG is converted to {{Pyro}}.

|name_11     = Regeneration
|desc_11     = Some time after its horns have been broken, digs into the ground and resurfaces with a new pair of intact horns.
}}
